item.title: Scheduled maintenance - Subscription Services
item.content:encoded:
[Medium] - Scheduled Maintenance

Summary: On March 3rd at 05:30 CET, there will be a 5-hour scheduled maintenance to improve Subscription services, potentially causing a ~5-minute window of errors for some customers making subscription changes. Maintenance will be closely monitored.

THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 3, 05:30 - 10:30 CET

Feb 12, 12:29 CET
Scheduled - On Sunday the 3rd of March, at 05:30 CET, there will be a scheduled maintenance to improve our Subscription services which will last about 5 hours.

During the change window, some customers could experience a ~5-minute window where they see errors while with making changes to their subscription (e.g upgrades, downgrades etc.).

Should you continuously see errors, latency or impact of any kind to your subscription changes, please reach out to us at https://www.typeform.com/help/contact/

We will also be closely monitoring our systems.

item.title: Scheduled maintenance - Subscriptions services
item.content:encoded:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Feb 22, 06:00 - 08:30 CET

Feb 9, 13:03 CET
Scheduled - On Thursday 22nd of February at 06:00 CET, we’ll be performing a scheduled maintenance to improve our Subscriptions service which will last about 2 hours.

During the change window, the following services will be affected, and users may experience errors with the following actions/views:

* Creating/upgrading subscriptions
* Editing payment information
* Some delays in the data shown in the plan & billing section

However, viewing subscription, invoices, and payment information should remain unaffected.

If you encounter errors, latency, or any impact related to the Subscriptions service, after the change window, please reach out to us at https://www.typeform.com/help/contact/.

We’ll be closely monitoring our systems and will provide updates here if necessary.

item.title: Scheduled maintenance - Excel App
item.content:encoded:
Feb 21, 09:00 CET
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Feb 21, 06:00 CET
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Feb 13, 17:51 CET
Scheduled - On Wednesday, 21st of February at 06:00 CET, we'll be performing a scheduled maintenance to improve our Excel App which will last about 3 hours.

During the maintenance window, users won't be able to edit or configure new Excel integrations.

Any responses collected on forms during the change window will be sent to Excel after the change window. However, we do expect a 3-4 hours delay before all are processed.

We will be closely monitoring our systems and share further updates here when the change starts.

Should you have any questions, please feel free to reach out at https://www.typeform.com/help/contact/

We will continue to work on this, and share updates whenever available.

Identified - We have identified errors impacting our Help Center and Signup pages. Users searching the Help Center or trying to Sign up to new accounts may be impacted. We are working on resolution with high priority.

Next update in ~30 minutes or as soon as it's available.

item.title: Typeform Webhooks, Integrations and Follow-ups - Delivery delayed
item.content:encoded:
Feb 9, 14:24 CET
Resolved - We are glad to inform you that the fix has been implemented and the incident resolved. We will run a problem investigation to understand what happened and how to prevent it from happening again.

Thanks for your understanding & sorry for any inconvenience this has caused.

Feb 8, 22:07 CET
Update - Webhook deliveries and some integrations may experience slight delays. We appreciate your patience and understanding.

Next update as soon as it's available.

Feb 8, 16:58 CET
Update - Syncing results to Google Sheets may experience delays due to the substantial volume of data being processed. The syncing of this data is ongoing.

We appreciate your patience and understanding. Next update as soon as it's available.

Feb 8, 13:11 CET
Update - Our systems are performing optimally, with webhooks, Follow-Ups, and integrations all functioning as expected.

Syncing with Google Sheets may experience delays due to the substantial volume of data being processed. These delays are estimated to last until 5-7 pm CET.

We appreciate your patience and understanding. Next update in ~ 1 hour or as soon as it's available.

Feb 8, 10:07 CET
Update - Our systems are performing optimally, with webhooks, Follow-Ups, and integrations all functioning as expected.

Syncing with Google Sheets may experience delays due to the substantial volume of data being processed.

We appreciate your patience and understanding. Next update in ~30 minutes or as soon as it's available.

Feb 8, 08:42 CET
Update - Users should now be able to establish webhooks, Follow-Ups, and integrations as usual.

As the solution continues to be implemented, data that was previously delayed due to this incident should progressively populate.

We are monitoring this and will continue to provide updates.

Feb 7, 23:34 CET
Update - Users should now be able to establish webhooks, Follow-Ups, and integrations as usual.

As the solution continues to be implemented, data that was previously delayed due to this incident should progressively populate.

We are monitoring this and will continue to provide updates.

Feb 7, 21:29 CET
Update - We're continuing to monitor the rollout of the solution that has been deployed.

Please be aware that existing webhooks, Follow-Ups, and integrations may encounter a delay in data transmission during this period.
The establishment of new integrations and webhooks is temporarily on hold. However, as the solution takes effect, these services will gradually resume their normal operation.

We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience this may cause. Please stay tuned for the next update, which is expected in approximately 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

Feb 7, 20:27 CET
Monitoring - We have successfully deployed a solution and will persistently keep our users informed about the ongoing progress.

Please be aware that existing webhooks, Follow-Ups, and integrations may encounter a delay in data transmission during this period.

The establishment of new integrations and webhooks is temporarily on hold. However, as the solution takes effect, these services will gradually resume their normal operation.

We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience this may cause. Please stay tuned for the next update, which is expected in approximately 45 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

Feb 7, 19:27 CET
Update - A fix has been deployed, and we will continue to update users on the progress.

We are really sorry for any inconvenience this is causing. Next update in ~45 minutes or as soon as it's available.

Feb 7, 18:27 CET
Update - We are working on resolving an interruption impacting our Webhooks, Integrations, and Follow-ups with high priority. At this time, it may take longer than expected for data to be sent through webhooks, integrations, or Follow-Up emails. Data is not lost, just delayed.


We are really sorry for any inconvenience this is causing. Next update in ~45 minutes or as soon as it's available.

Feb 7, 17:30 CET
Update - We are working on resolving a brief traffic interruption impacting our Webhooks, Integrations, and Follow-ups with high priority.

We are really sorry for any inconvenience this is causing. Next update in ~30 minutes or as soon as it's available.

Update - We are working on resolving a brief traffic interruption impacting our Webhooks, Integrations, and Follow-ups with high priority.

We are really sorry for any inconvenience this is causing. Next update in ~30 minutes or as soon as it's available.

Feb 7, 15:52 CET
Update - We are working on resolving a brief traffic interruption impacting our Webhooks, Integrations, and Follow-ups with high priority.

Update - We are working on resolving a brief traffic interruption impacting our Webhooks, Integrations, and Follow-ups with high priority.

item.title: Typeform Zapier Connections - Not sending data to Zapier
item.content:encoded:
Jan 17, 22:59 CET
Resolved - On January 16th, 2024 we identified an issue that caused data sent from Typeform to Zapier to fail.

The incident began at 12:23 PM EST and lasted until 16:31 PM EST.

Events were not sent to Zapier during this time and will need to be manually uploaded.

REF: ZD 735553 | TU-7808
